definitions.definition: someone who delivers the post ( mail ) to, and/or collects the post from, residential or commercial addresses , or from public mailboxes .
One of the two most experienced barristers in the Court of Exchequer, who have precedence in motions , so called from the place where he sits, the other of the two being the tubman .

main_definition: ( chiefly UK , Ireland , Commonwealth ) someone who delivers the post ( mail ) to, and/or collects the post from, residential or commercial addresses , or from public mailboxes .
secondary_definitions: One of the two most experienced barristers in the Court of Exchequer, who have precedence in motions , so called from the place where he sits, the other of the two being the tubman .
